species.name: ogerpon
descriptions: This mischief-loving Pokémon is full of curiosity. It battles by drawing out the type-based energy contained within its masks.
This Pokémon's type changes based on which mask it's wearing. It confounds its enemies with nimble movements and kicks.

abilities.name: mold-breaker
abilities.effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.
